entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make it easier to leverage existing configured JWT and JWKS infra to manually validate tokens #58851
  • gRPC Transcoding: options to ser/deserialize enums without prefix #58850
  • Why does the page automatically redirect to "/Account/Login" when the user is not authorized? #58848

Closed

  • Routing with common prefix #58838
  • Blazor - Wasm pre-rendering (without server interactivity) - MSAL Auth on client side only not working #58833
  • [Blazor] Unuseful message when calling InvokeAsync() #58821

PullRequests

Created

  • chore: fixed missed conditional theory for testing named pipe #58849
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Use the runtime->AspNetCore transport package as the sentinel package instead of the BrowserDebugHost package #58847
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Handling CultureInfo.InvariantCulture in RequestLocalizationMiddleware #58844
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
